channel.title: Please help fast :( i dont know what to do!
channel.description:
Ok, When you kill like 6 npcs it crashes the server and gives me this error..
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 200 at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:1197) at server.main(server.java:98) [/code]
I dont know what to do please help

item.title: Please help fast :( i dont know what to do!
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

what? lol im confused so what do i got to do? i go to npchandler? search for what? and do what ? Lol im not that experienced in coding

Read full topic
item.source: Please help fast :( i dont know what to do!

item.title: Please help fast :( i dont know what to do!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

You’re probably trying to declare an array’s value at an index of 200 when the whole array only covers 200, you must change the array’s index count to 201.

Read full topic
